DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate efficacy medication gabapentin treat person cannabis dependence .
DOC.detailed_description: This 12-week , double blind , placebo control , dose range study evaluate efficacy gabapentin treat outpatient cannabis dependence . Counseling research assessment occur weekly throughout 12-week treatment phase .
